translations.name: New Testament Portions
translations.description: The First Ambonese Malay Bible portions with the Old Testament portions (Ruth, Esther, Jonah) and New Testament portions Luke, Acts, 1st and 2nd Thessalonians, 1st and 2nd Timothy, Titus, Philemon, James, Philippians, and all 3 Johns in Ambonese Malay.

translations.name: alkita bahasa malayu ambon
